steps: step 2: Login at Page_login --> navigate to Page_home
step 3: At Page_home click on hyperlink_team_project --> navigate to Page_project
step 4: At Page_project click on hyperlink_team_project_overview --> navigate to Page_overview
step 5: At Page_overview click on hyperlink_team_project_test_reports_test_maintena --> navigate to Page_test-reports_test-maintenance_active
step 6: At Page_test-reports_test-maintenance_active click on hyperlink_team_project_test_reports_test_maintena --> navigate to Page_test-reports_test-maintenance_stale
step 7: Add visual checkpoint at Page_test-reports_test-maintenance_stale
